article: president luiz inacio lula da silva called monday for reforming the united nations and giving it a new mission of eliminating hunger and poverty , as he opened a three-day meeting of socialists and social democrats from around the world .
abstract: at opening of socialist congress brazilian president calls for reform of united nations
